about.me: Hi, I'm Mat. ECO Pool combines two of my loves â€“ nature and technology! Stake with ECO Pool and make the world a better place! We ensure reliable returns for our delegators and the planet. Every month we donate 30% of our pool rewards to fight climate change and environmental challenges. We support a variety of trusted charities, to sustain and regenerate nature and the diversity of life on earth. More details about our donations on ECOpool.io
about.server: We run a mix of cloud and bare metal servers based on enterprise grade hardware with multiple layers of security and redundancy. Our servers run on 100% renewable energy, and along with our regular donations for the planet, we ensure that ECO Pool runs as a carbon positive Cardano stake pool.
